name: Guard
text: Name a non-**{{ name }}** card and choose another player.  If that player has that card, he or she is out of the round.

name: Baron
text: You and another player secretly compare hands.  The player with the lower value is out of the round.

name: Handmaid
text: Until your next turn, ignore all effects from other player's cards.

name: Prince
text: Choose any player (_including yourself_) to discard his or her hand and draw a new card.

name: King
text: Trade hands with another player of your choice.

name: Countess
text: If you have this card and the **{{ name #7 }}** or **{{ name #6 }}** in your hand, you must discard this card.

name: Princess
text: If you discard this card, you are out of the round.
